verses.verse: You shall not <S%H5375>raise<s%> a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H8088>report:<s%> <S%H7896>put<s%> not your <S%H3027>hand<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> to be an <S%H2555>unrighteous<s%> <S%H5707>witness.<s%>

You shall not <S%H1961>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> a <S%H7227>multitude<s%> to do <S%H7451>evil;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H6030>speak<s%> in a <S%H7379>cause<s%> to <S%H5186>decline<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> to <S%H5186>wrest<s%> judgment:
<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you <S%H1921>countenance<s%> a <S%H1800>poor<s%> man in his <S%H7379>cause.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> you <S%H6293>meet<s%> your <S%H341>enemy's<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H8582>going<s%> <S%H8582>astray,<s%> you shall surely <S%H7725>bring<s%> it <S%H7725>back<s%> to him <S%H7725>again.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2543>ass<s%> of him that <S%H8130>hates<s%> you <S%H7257>lying<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H4853>burden,<s%> and would <S%H2308>forbear<s%> to <S%H5800>help<s%> him, you shall surely <S%H5800>help<s%> with him.
You shall not <S%H5186>wrest<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of your <S%H34>poor<s%> in his <S%H7379>cause.<s%>

<S%H7368>Keep<s%> you <S%H7368>far<s%> from a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H1697>matter;<s%> and the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> and <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H2026>slay<s%> you not: for I will not <S%H6663>justify<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7810>gift:<s%> for the <S%H7810>gift<s%> <S%H5786>blinds<s%> the <S%H6493>wise,<s%> and <S%H5557>perverts<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>

Also you shall not <S%H3905>oppress<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger:<s%> for you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H5315>heart<s%> of a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> <S%H3588>seeing<s%> you were <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
And <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H776>land,<s%> and shall <S%H622>gather<s%> in the <S%H8393>fruits<s%> thereof:

But the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> year you shall let it <S%H8058>rest<s%> and <S%H5203>lie<s%> still; that the <S%H34>poor<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H398>eat:<s%> and what they <S%H3499>leave<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H398>eat.<s%> In <S%H3651>like<s%> <S%H3651>manner<s%> you shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with your <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> and with your olive <S%H2132>grove.<s%>

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> your <S%H4639>work,<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7673>rest:<s%> that your <S%H7794>ox<s%> and your <S%H2543>ass<s%> may <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of your <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> may be <S%H5314>refreshed.<s%>

And in <S%H3605>all<s%> things that I have <S%H559>said<s%> to you be <S%H8104>circumspect:<s%> and make <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> let it be <S%H8085>heard<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H7969>Three<s%> times you shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> a <S%H2287>feast<s%> to me in the <S%H8141>year.<s%>

You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread: (you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, in the time <S%H4150>appointed<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib;<s%> for in it you <S%H3318>came<s%> out from <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H7387>empty:<s%>)

And the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of your <S%H4639>labors,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H2232>sown<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H614>ingathering,<s%> which is in the <S%H3318>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> when you have <S%H622>gathered<s%> in your <S%H4639>labors<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

<S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2138>males<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

You shall not <S%H2076>offer<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H2557>leavened<s%> bread; <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of my <S%H2282>sacrifice<s%> <S%H3885>remain<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

The <S%H7225>first<s%> of the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of your <S%H127>land<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> You shall not <S%H1310>seethe<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H7971>send<s%> an <S%H4397>Angel<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and to <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H3559>prepared.<s%>

<S%H8104>Beware<s%> of him, and <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H4843>provoke<s%> him not; for he will not <S%H5375>pardon<s%> your <S%H6588>transgressions:<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%> is in him.

But <S%H518>if<s%> you shall indeed <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H1696>speak;<s%> then I will be an <S%H340>enemy<s%> to your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and an <S%H6887>adversary<s%> to your <S%H6696>adversaries.<s%>

For my <S%H4397>Angel<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and <S%H935>bring<s%> you in to the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites:<s%> and I will <S%H3582>cut<s%> them off.

You shall not <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to their <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> after their <S%H4639>works:<s%> but you shall utterly <S%H2040>overthrow<s%> them, and quite <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H7665>down<s%> their <S%H4676>images.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and he shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> your <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and your <S%H4325>water;<s%> and I will <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H4245>sickness<s%> away from the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you.
There shall <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H7921>cast<s%> their young, nor be <S%H6135>barren,<s%> in your <S%H776>land:<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of your <S%H3117>days<s%> I will <S%H4390>fulfill.<s%>

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> my <S%H367>fear<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and will <S%H2000>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> you shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> turn their <S%H6203>backs<s%> to you.

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6880>hornets<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, which shall <S%H1644>drive<s%> out the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> from <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.

I will not <S%H1644>drive<s%> them out from <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> and the <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H7227>multiply<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you.

By <S%H4592>little<s%> and <S%H4592>little<s%> I will <S%H1644>drive<s%> them out from <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H5704>until<s%> you be <S%H6509>increased,<s%> and <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And I will <S%H7896>set<s%> your <S%H1366>bounds<s%> from the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> even to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and from the <S%H4057>desert<s%> to the <S%H5104>river:<s%> for I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and you shall <S%H1644>drive<s%> them out <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.
You shall <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them, nor with their <S%H430>gods.<s%>

They shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> they make you <S%H2398>sin<s%> against me: for if you <S%H5647>serve<s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> it will <S%H3588>surely<s%> be a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to you.
